defs.text: Automated Build, Test and Deploy with GitHub Actions

svg.text: Automated Build, Test and Deploy with GitHub Actions
Automated Build, Test and Deploy with GitHub Actions

g.text: name: Deploy | on: push: branches: [main] | jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest
steps: - checkout - setup-node - npm ci - npm test - eas build - eas update
Full pipeline: 20-30 min | With cache: 10-15 min
Full pipeline: 20-30 min | With cache: 10-15 min

text: Full pipeline time: ~20-30 minutes | With cache: ~10-15 minutes
